players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: remained silent.
You: "Bob, why did you stay silent? I think Charlie was a villager."
Diana: "Bob, you might be a liar. I think you might be a mafia."
You: "Bob, if you're innocent, why didn't you speak? I think you might be mafia."
Bob: "I investigated Diana and found she is mafia. Charlie was a villager. Please vote for her."
Diana: "Bob, you are the mafia. Vote for me."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: remained silent.
Alice: "Bob, why did you stay silent? I think Charlie was a villager."
Diana: "Bob, you might be a liar. I think you might be a mafia."
Alice: "Bob, if you're innocent, why didn't you speak? I think you might be mafia."
You: "I investigated Diana and found she is mafia. Charlie was a villager. Please vote for her."
Diana: "Bob, you are the mafia. Vote for me."
